title: Spencer Krause: Why hardware is the new engineering frontier
description:
The podcast guest this week is Spencer Krause, co-founder and CEO of SKA Robotics and co-founder of Tension Dynamics.

The post Spencer Krause: Why hardware is the new engineering frontier appeared first on The Robot Report.
